# knitr

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# library
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)
```

# load data
```{r}
kenya_census <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2021, week = 4)
```

# explore
```{r}
str(kenya_census) #have a look what is available
#oh nice - crops!

crops <- kenya_census$crops
str(crops)
glimpse(crops)
```
